categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kagan was a female Sith Acolyte of the Sith Empire during the Cold War. Trained in the Sith Academy on Korriban, as part of her final trial Kagan was sent by Overseer Harkun into the Valley of the Dark Lords to retrieve the helm of Tulak Hord along with a group of other acolytes, which included Greck, Bensyn and Lana Beniko. Upon entering the Tomb of Tulak Hord the group was overwhelmed by k'lor'slugs, which left Greck dead and Kagan severely wounded. Beniko eventually found Tulak's Hord helmet among the rubble, but before they could leave, Kagan was killed by an insane Zabrak acolyte.
